original_text: Are we not regarded by him as foreigners? For he has sold us, and he has indeed devoured our money.
korean_text: 아버지가 우리를 팔고 우리의 돈을 다 먹어버렸으니 아버지가 우리를 외국인처럼 여기는 것이 아닌가

sentences.original_text: Are we not regarded by him as foreigners?
and he has indeed devoured our money.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 참으로 우리 돈을 탕진했습니다.
